item.title: k8s Authentication
item.description: with IAM user -> with API_KEY & API_TOKEN audience attached iam role (eg: ec2 instance) update the iam role and user mapping in configmap aws-auth OIDC OIDC built in at the eks cluster OICD can request AWS IAM to issue the web identity token the token will be used to assume role and access AWS service Item Value OICD oidc.hhuge9.com IAM user hugotse OIDC user kevintse IAM role S3Admin To assume a role in EKS Associate OIDC to AWS IAM - that why it is called associate-iam-oidc-provider.
